overview.description: The Weather App provides real-time weather data for a specified location, featuring temperature, humidity, and wind direction. Users can personalize the interface with a choice of 10 color themes.
keyFeatures: Real-Time Weather: Displays current temperature in Celsius, humidity, and wind direction for the chosen location.
Color Theme Customization: Users can select from 10 different color themes for a personalized interface.
Responsive Design: Ensures a seamless experience across devices.

updateFeatures: Initial release with core weather display functionalities.
Added 10 color theme options for UI customization.
Responsive layout implemented with CSS and JavaScript.
